name: Metro Connect - Train Control
description:
Metro Connect - Train Control - exciting puzzle game for building up metro lines!

Start an exciting adventure of launching and improving your own subway system!
You have to become a great mayor and build your own subway line based on the map of the famous metropolis - New York.
You start moving by connecting the points with tunnels, and you will be able to launch trains, transport residents and discover new regions!
The flow of passengers is growing and you need to build up new metro lines, increase number of stations and add new trains. As you discover new regions, you can earn more money and improve your metro even more!
What awaits for you:
- Fascinating gameplay
- Improvement of trains and stations
- Excellent graphics and music
